attributes.additional_details: I want the government to make June 21st a Bank Holiday, to recognise the efforts of the nation during the pandemic.  This is the day families and friends can reunite after being apart for so long. It would allow for street parties or parties hosted by the hospitality sector which has suffered throughout the pandemic. This would mean a huge collective boost for the nation's morale ajd an economic boost for the hospitality sectors. Followed by a national clap for heroes at 1700.
attributes.background: I want the government to make June 21st a Bank Holiday

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
